New Records: The Rays' season-long struggles with RISP, which is the lowest full-season average in club history
Key Match Events: Failed to capitalize on scoring opportunities with runners in scoring position
Specific instances in the third and fourth innings where they had runners in scoring position but didn't score

Shane Baz's solid pitching performance despite the loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: Rays are seven games out of the final American League Wild Card spot
Season-long struggles with RISP impacting their playoff chances
